  • Method Details

    • evaluate

      public Control evaluate() throws Exception

      Wraps processAll() preventing final user from manipulating directly validation stream

      Returns:
      the result of the evaluation operated over target properties
      Throws:
      Exception

    • fetchConverter

      protected abstract Class<? extends Converter<Control>> fetchConverter​(A annotation)
      Parameters:
      annotation - the annotation from which retrieve converter class information
      Returns:
      an instance of the converter class

    • evaluationReductor

      protected abstract BinaryOperator<Control> evaluationReductor()
      Returns:
      the evaluation based on properties concatenation

    • comparingPredicate

      public abstract Comparator<Method> comparingPredicate()

      Defines a procedure to sort properties to validate.

      Returns:
      a comparator for sorting properties in validation stream

    • customFilter

      protected Boolean customFilter​(Method m)
      Parameters:
      m - A property getter to filter
      Returns:
      true if the property should be included in validation stream

    • invokeOnNull

      protected <R> Function<Method,​R> invokeOnNull​(FunctionalWrapper<Method,​R,​Exception> throwingFunction, Function<Method,​R> fallback)

      Handy way to provide a fallback in functional java

      Invoke method against a class and uses fallback in case of null property

      Type Parameters:
      R - parametric return type
      Parameters:
      throwingFunction - wraps method invocation
      fallback - invoked when throwingFunction results null
      Returns:
      result of the invocation in throwingFunction or value provided from fallback function

    • invokeOnNull

      protected <R> Function<Method,​R> invokeOnNull​(FunctionalWrapper<Method,​R,​Exception> throwingFunction, Supplier<R> fallback)
      Same as invokeOnNull(FunctionalWrapper, Function) but takes a supplier instead of a function (no params needed)

    • getMainAnnotation

      protected A getMainAnnotation​(Method m)
      Parameters:
      m - Method from which retrieve target annotation
      Returns:
      target annotation

    • process

      protected Control process​(A annotation, Converter<Control> converter, Object property, Method method) throws Exception
      This method provides an handy way to developer to alter property evaluation/process avoiding evaluator preparing phase to be exposed.
      Parameters:
      annotation - the target property custom annotation, carrying all the information useful to evaluation
      converter - the converter class stated in annotation
      property - the property about to be evaluated
      Returns:
      the evaluation of the property
      Throws:
      Exception - if evaluation fails

    • fetchValues

      protected Object[] fetchValues​(String... properties)
      Parameters:
      properties - are the properties needed from target object
      Returns:
      a list of objects representing the required properties

    • fetchValue

      protected Object fetchValue​(String propName)

      protected Object fetchValue​(Method getter)
